quote: We smile at the ignorance of the savage who cuts down the tree in order to reach its fruit but the same blunder is made by every person who is over eager and impatient in the pursuit of pleasure.
quote_letters: WE SMILE AT THE IGNORANCE OF THE SAVAGE WHO CUTS DOWN THE TREE IN ORDER TO REACH ITS FRUIT BUT THE SAME BLUNDER IS MADE BY EVERY PERSON WHO IS OVER EAGER AND IMPATIENT IN THE PURSUIT OF PLEASURE
